com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env.misc

Class CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams.LogLevelConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env.misc.CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams.LogLevelConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStringConverter<Level>
    Enclosing class:
    CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams

    public static final class CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams.LogLevelConverter
extends Object
implements IStringConverter<Level>
    This class provides a method to convert a value command line-argument into Java-object with the same type as CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams.logLevel field.

    Instantiability: allowed.
    Mutability: immutable.
    Thread safety: thread-safe.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Converts String object into Level object that can be used as value of CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams.logLevel field.

      • LogLevelConverter

        public LogLevelConverter(boolean calledFromAgent)
        Constructs an instance of CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams.LogLevelConverter.
        Parameters:
        calledFromAgent - Specifies if the constructor was called from Java-agent class or from main class of the application. The argument only affects an exception message in case fail of convertation.

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public final Level convert(@Nullable
                           String paramValue)
                    throws ParameterException
        Converts String object into Level object that can be used as value of CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams.logLevel field.
        Specified by:
        convert in interface IStringConverter<Level>
        Parameters:
        paramValue - String object to convert. Can be null.
        Returns:
        Converted Level object.
        Throws:
        ParameterException - If the specified String can't be converted into Level.
